title: 48 Hours to Buy
overview: The stakes couldn't be higher. Buying a home is the biggest financial decision most people make in their lives. It can literally change everything, which is why most people spend months searching for the perfect home. Now imagine having only 2 days. 48 Hours to Buy features couples who are in a housing pressure cooker - whether they're relocating unexpectedly for work, or compelled by a personal situation, their relocation is coming up and they need to find a house fast.
